text.section:
The City of Takoma Park shall:
Establish a stormwater management fund; and
Deposit in the fund:
Receipts and revenues from any ad valorem tax, user charge, or utility fee imposed under § 24-405 of this subtitle;
Fees, contributions, and reserve funds collected by the Commission before July 1, 1990, for stormwater management activities in the city and transferred to the city under this title; and
Charges, fees, fees-in-lieu, and other contributions received from any person or governmental unit in connection with stormwater management activities or practices.
Money in the Takoma Park stormwater management fund shall be used only to pay for the costs of stormwater management as set forth in § 24-405(a) of this subtitle.
